message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This feels like a fair compromise.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, but $17,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
